ja498:9.4: Api te varaṃ attamano dadeyya → api nu te varaṃ attamano dadeyya (s2, s3) | api nu te attamano varaṃ dade (mr)
ja498:11.1: Āhaññantu → āhaññare (s2, s3) | āhaññaruṃ (pts1), bherimudiṅgasaṅkhe → ... saṅkhā (s2, s3)
ja498:18.1: Sohaṃ evaṃ pajānāmi → so ahaṃ suppajānāmi (bj, pts1)
ja498:19.2: dvipadākaniṭṭhā → dipadā kaniṭṭhā (bj, pts1) | dvipadakaniṭṭhā (s2, s3)
ja498:28.4: Adhammakāro tava → adhammakāro ca te (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
